input_text: Despite the fact that it was raining heavily, the marathon runners continued their race with determination and enthusiasm.

translations.to_german: Trotz der Tatsache, dass es stark regnete, setzten die Marathonläufer ihr Rennen entschlossen und begeistert fort.
translations.to_english: Despite the fact that it was raining heavily, the marathon runners continued their race determinedly and enthusiastically.

input_text: She postponed the meeting until her manager, who had been away on a business trip, returned to the office with the final approval.

translations.to_german: She verschieb das Meeting, bis ihre Managerin, die auf Geschäftsreise gewesen war, mit der endgültigen Genehmigung ins Büro zurückkehrte.
translations.to_english: She postponed the meeting until her manager, who had been on a business trip, returned to the office with the final approval.

input_text: While I enjoy spending time with friends at the beach, I often find myself yearning for the solitude of the mountains.

translations.to_german: Während ich es genieße, Zeit mit Freunden am Strand zu verbringen, ertappe ich mich oft dabei, wie ich mich nach der Einsamkeit der Berge sehne.
translations.to_english: While I enjoy spending time with friends at the beach, I often find myself longing for the solitude of the mountains.

input_text: The scientist explained the experiment in detail so that everyone, including those without a background in physics, could understand the significance of the findings.

translations.to_german: Der Wissenschaftler erklärte das Experiment detailliert, sodass jeder, auch diejenigen ohne physikalischen Hintergrund, die Bedeutung der Ergebnisse verstehen konnte.
translations.to_english: The scientist explained the experiment in detail so that everyone, even those without a background in physics, could understand the significance of the results.

input_text: If you work hard and stay focused on your goals, you will achieve more than you ever thought possible in life.

translations.to_german: Wenn du hart arbeitest und dich auf deine Ziele konzentrierst, wirst du im Leben mehr erreichen, als du jemals für möglich gehalten hättest.
translations.to_english: If you work hard and focus on your goals, you will achieve more in life than you ever thought possible.

input_text: Although the restaurant was highly recommended by locals, the service was slow, and the food did not live up to our expectations.

translations.to_german: Obwohl das Restaurant von den Einheimischen sehr empfohlen wurde, war der Service langsam und das Essen entsprach nicht unseren Erwartungen.
translations.to_english: Although the restaurant was highly recommended by the locals, the service was slow and the food did not meet our expectations.

input_text: Because she studied diligently every night for the past month, Maria performed exceptionally well on her final exams.

translations.to_german: Weil sie in den letzten Monat jede Nacht fleißig gelernt hat, hat Maria ihre Abschlussprüfungen außergewöhnlich gut bestanden.
translations.to_english: Because she studied diligently every night in the past month, Maria passed her final exams exceptionally well.

input_text: The company implemented new policies to improve employee satisfaction, which, in turn, led to increased productivity across all departments.

translations.to_german: Die Firma führte neue Richtlinien ein, um die Mitarbeiterzufriedenheit zu verbessern, was wiederum zu einer gesteigerten Produktivität in allen Abteilungen führte.
translations.to_english: The company implemented new guidelines to improve employee satisfaction, which in turn led to increased productivity in all departments.

input_text: After the storm had passed and the sun reappeared, the children ventured outside to play in the puddles left behind.

translations.to_german: Nachdem der Sturm vorübergezogen war und die Sonne wieder erschien, wagten sich die Kinder nach draußen, um in den zurückgebliebenen Pfützen zu spielen.
translations.to_english: After the storm had passed and the sun reappeared, the children ventured outside to play in the remaining puddles.

input_text: Whenever he travels abroad, John makes it a point to learn a few basic phrases in the local language to show respect for the culture.

translations.to_german: Immer wenn er ins Ausland reist, bemüht sich John, einige grundlegende Phrasen in der Landessprache zu lernen, um Respekt für die Kultur zu zeigen.
translations.to_english: Whenever he travels abroad, John makes an effort to learn some basic phrases in the local language to show respect for the culture.
